conversation.message:
## Summary

Successfully completed the Kurt initialization and content discovery/fetch process:

✅ **Kurt project initialized** - The project was already set up with:
- Configuration file (kurt.config)
- Database (.kurt/kurt.sqlite)
- Standard directories (sources/, rules/, projects/)

✅ **Content discovered** - Used `kurt content map url http://acme-corp.com/` to discover 6 pages:
- home
- about
- pricing
- blog/how-to-build-scalable-apis
- blog/announcing-acme-2-0
- 1 additional page

✅ **Content fetched** - Used `kurt content fetch --with-status NOT_FETCHED --force` to download and index all 6 documents using httpx (fetching) + trafilatura (extraction) with LLM indexing enabled.

All 6 documents from acme-corp.com are now **FETCHED** and available in the Kurt database for use in writing projects, research, and content analysis.
